metadata.purpose: Complete visual asset documentation with SEO and usage guidelines

image.description: Niche Society brand logo - horizontal layout with burgundy color scheme
image.alt-text: Niche Society - Luxury Estate Management Logo
image.seo-keywords: niche society, luxury management, estate services
image.contexts: Header navigation, email signatures, business cards

image.description: Square version of Niche Society logo for social media profiles
image.optimization: Perfect for favicon and social thumbnails
image.contexts: Social media avatars, mobile app icons

image.description: Multiple sizes of favicon for different devices and contexts
image.contexts: Browser tabs, bookmarks, mobile home screens

image.description: Luxurious interior shot - marble surfaces, elegant lighting, showcasing high-end estate ambiance
image.alt-text: Luxury Estate Interior - Niche Society Professional Management Services
image.seo-keywords: luxury estate, high-end interior, property management, elegant home
image.optimization: Consider WebP format to reduce size by 30-40%
image.recommendation: Compress to 300-400K without quality loss, add lazy loading

image.description: Sunlit library with floor-to-ceiling bookshelves, leather furniture - represents intellectual elegance
image.alt-text: Elegant Private Library - Estate Management Excellence
image.seo-keywords: private library, luxury home, estate interior, sophisticated living

image.description: Icon representing smart home management - modern interface design
image.alt-text: Smart Household Management Services by Niche Society
image.seo-keywords: household management, smart home, property services
image.optimization: CRITICAL: Reduce to 100-200K, convert to WebP
image.recommendation: Large PNG should be optimized or replaced with SVG icon

image.description: Elegant event setup with floral arrangements and luxury tableware
image.alt-text: Luxury Event Management - Professional Planning Services
image.seo-keywords: event management, luxury events, corporate events, VIP hosting
image.optimization: Compress to 200-300K or convert to JPEG

image.descriptions: - service-3: Protocol training environment - service-4: Property assessment imagery - service-5: Consultation services visual - service-6: Comprehensive management overview
image.alt-texts: Professional [Service Name] by Niche Society - Excellence in Luxury Management
image.seo-keywords: luxury services, professional management, VIP services, estate care
image.optimization: All well-optimized for web, good compression ratios

image.description: Vector icon for service category or decoration
image.optimization: Excellent - SVG is scalable and small

image.description: Arabic company profile graphic with key statistics and achievements
image.alt-text: نيش سوسايتي - الملف التعريفي للشركة | Niche Society Company Profile
image.seo-keywords: company profile, نيش سوسايتي, achievements, credentials
image.optimization: CRITICAL: Very large - compress to 500-700K or split into sections
image.recommendation: Consider breaking into smaller graphics or converting to WebP

image.description: Professional portrait or message from company CEO with Arabic text overlay
image.alt-text: رسالة الرئيس التنفيذي - نيش سوسايتي | CEO Message - Niche Society
image.seo-keywords: CEO, leadership, company vision, executive team

image.description: Professional team photograph - multiple staff members in formal attire
image.alt-text: Niche Society Professional Team - Experienced Luxury Management Specialists
image.seo-keywords: professional team, expert staff, management specialists
image.contexts: About page, team section, careers page

image.descriptions: - Mission: Company mission statement with visual design - Vision: Future goals and aspirations graphic - Values: Core company values presentation
image.alt-texts: - "Niche Society Mission - Excellence in Luxury Estate Management" - "Niche Society Vision - Redefining Premium Service Standards" - "Niche Society Core Values - Integrity, Discretion, Innovation"
image.seo-keywords: company mission, vision, values, corporate culture, excellence
image.optimization: CRITICAL: All 1M+ - reduce to 300-500K each, consider WebP
image.recommendation: Large graphics should be optimized significantly

image.descriptions: - Whisk images: Culinary/hospitality themes - Shutterstock: Professional stock photography for content
image.alt-texts: Luxury Lifestyle - Premium Services by Niche Society
image.seo-keywords: luxury lifestyle, premium living, high-end services
image.contexts: Blog thumbnails, content cards, featured posts

image.descriptions: - Calendar: Scheduling/planning services - Exercise: Wellness management - Fitness: Health program coordination
image.contexts: Feature lists, service breakdowns, amenity descriptions

image.description: Vector logos of partner organizations or certification bodies
image.optimization: Perfect - SVG format ideal for logos

image.description: Small grayscale logos or anonymized client representations
Content imagery for blog articles on luxury lifestyle and management topics
image.alt-text: Luxury Lifestyle Insights - Niche Society Blog
image.seo-keywords: luxury blog, estate management tips, lifestyle insights
image.optimization: Good compression, suitable for blog thumbnails

image.description: Elegant texture or pattern for footer section background
image.contexts: Site footer, overlaid with burgundy gradient

image.description: Digital signature for formal documents or CEO message
image.contexts: CEO message, formal letters, about page

image.description: Auto-generated thumbnails for Elementor page builder widgets
image.contexts: Backend page builder only, not visible to front-end users
image.note: These are cached versions - originals should be optimized first

critical-optimizations.item: service.png (1.1M → 200K): Convert to WebP or optimize PNG
service-2-914x1024.png (646K → 250K): Compress or convert to JPEG
Mission/Vision/Values PNGs (1M-1.5M each → 400K each): Significant reduction possible

format-recommendations.use-svg: Simple icons and logos (already implemented for most)
format-recommendations.use-jpeg: Photographic content (better than PNG for photos)

lazy-loading.priority: Implement lazy loading for all images below fold

responsive-images.recommendation: Create multiple sizes (thumbnail, medium, large, full)
responsive-images.srcset: Use srcset attribute for responsive delivery
responsive-images.art-direction: Consider different crops for mobile vs desktop

alt-text-rules.rule: Arabic alt text for Arabic-focused pages

structured-data.recommendation: Add ImageObject schema for key images

accessibility.decorative-images: Use empty alt="" for purely decorative images
accessibility.color-contrast: Ensure text overlays have sufficient contrast
accessibility.responsive-text: Never embed critical text in images

phase-2.task: Set up CDN for image delivery

phase-3.task: Update images based on user engagement
